description.0: A bow, despite the name. After countless experiments and improvements to the design, the creator of the ultimate slingshot found himself to have made what was actually a bow.

0.0: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by <cryo>36%</cryo>. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

1.0: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by <cryo>42%</cryo>. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

2.0: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by <cryo>48%</cryo>. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

3.0: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by <cryo>54%</cryo>. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.

4.0: If a Normal or Charged Attack hits a target within 0.3s of being fired, increases DMG by <cryo>60%</cryo>. Otherwise, decreases DMG by 10%.
